sourcesContent:
<template>
  <IonPage>
    <IonHeader>
      <IonToolbar>
        <IonTitle>Groups</IonTitle>
      </IonToolbar>
    </IonHeader>
    <IonContent :fullscreen="true">

      <IonList v-for="(value, name) in roomNamesAndIds" :key="name">
        <GroupItem :name="value.name" :id="value.id"></GroupItem>
      </IonList>

    </IonContent>
  </IonPage>
</template>

<script lang="js">
import { defineComponent, reactive, ref } from 'vue';
import { IonPage, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonTitle, IonContent, IonList } from '@ionic/vue';
import { useMatrixClient } from '../stores/MatrixClient.js';
import { OverlayEventDetail } from '@ionic/core/components';
import GroupItem from "@/components/GroupItem.vue";

// TODO - Ranking functionality of group membership to curate what appears on top of the list on group profile

const client = useMatrixClient()
let roomNamesAndIds = reactive({})

setInterval(() => {
  Object.assign(roomNamesAndIds, client.getAllRoomNamesAndIds())
}, 10000)

export default defineComponent({
  name: 'GroupsPage',
  components: {GroupItem, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonTitle, IonContent, IonPage },
  data() {
    return {
      roomNamesAndIds: roomNamesAndIds,
    }
  },
});
</script>
